title: Scenario-Based Teamwork Learning for Strengthening Science Team Project Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Development of Teamwork Skills (Communication, Conflict Management) for Scientific Problem-Solving in a Smartphone-Centric Environment

learning_goals: Learners can recognize conflict situations arising during scientific problem-solving processes and propose three or more appropriate resolution strategies
Learners can explain effective communication strategies by applying them to scenario-based discussions during team projects
Learners can improve project outcomes by 20% or more by applying teamwork skills learned in real-world science experiment collaboration scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
